description:
Cushioning and protection to help you excel on long runs and challenging terrain. The plush midsole and lightweight foam keep the grams down while providing additional cushion on rough trails. A high-traction Surface CTRL™ rubber sole adds grip to the grind.

  • Seamless upper combines breathable mesh with a TPU toe cap and heel cup to protect your feet
  • Tongue wings reduce slippage and improve step-in comfort and fit
  • Updated D-width last accommodates a wide range of foot shapes
  • Dual-density EVA midsole is cushioning and responsive
  • Pebax® drop-in insert promotes a natural gait and smooth transitions
  • Rocker geometry provides a smooth ride and fast transition
  • 3D TPU plate keeps feet stable
  • Surface CTRL™ rubber with 5mm lugs grip solid and loose terrain
name: The North Face Vectiv Infinite 2 Trail Running Shoes - Women's
